sub_title: Entrepreneur | My Tour Expert – The Netherlands | Travel Collective – Denmark  |                                                                                  Let us help you accelerate your travel experience today!
summary:
I specialize in helping individuals, tour operators, businesses, and sports clubs travel better. With a passion for tourism cultivated from growing up in Germany, and Slovenia and developing my career in the Netherlands, I have an insatiable need to explore and share my experiences with others. My expertise lies in European and Balkan countries.

I don't follow trends in tourism; I try to make them. I help individual travellers get the most out of their holidays. I focus on fly & drive holidays, with preselected hotels, flights, and rent-a-car deals. Tell me your travel habits, and I will provide an unforgettable travel experience. Let's skip the middleman. Book directly and travel with assistance.

For tour operators and businesses, I focus on Balkan countries - I know the countries and speak the language. I have a wide range of excellent partners and service providers, guaranteeing the best rates and programs tailored to your clients' needs. I connect you directly with hotels and service providers. No markup added. Save money and time by being ahead of the others.

For companies, are you looking for the perfect team-building or professional trip in Eastern and Southeastern Europe? Look no further! I am here to provide you with expert support in organizing the ideal experience tailored to your unique wishes and needs. Let me take the stress off your hands and make your next corporate adventure unforgettable.

For sports clubs and academies, looking for top-notch facilities and training programs in Slovenia, I've got you covered. I'll take care of all the planning and connect you with the best sports clubs and academies, so you can focus on what you do best.

Are you passionate about sustainable education and unforgettable travel experiences? Look no further than TRAVEL COLLECTIVE! As the Head of Sales and Production, I am proud to be a part of a team that is dedicated to connecting local schools and NGOs to provide one-of-a-kind educational trips. Our focus on sustainability means that not only will your school trip be unforgettable, but it will also make a positive impact on the environment. Join us in creating meaningful experiences that inspire students to learn and grow. 

Let me accelerate your travel experience and share my passion for exploration with you. Contact me today.

MARKO@MYTOUR.EXPERT – Owner, My Tour Expert
MARKO@TRAVELCOLLECTIVE.DK – Head of Sales & Production, Travel Collective
